skill.name: docs-review
skill.description: Review documentation changes for compliance with the Metabase writing style guide. Use when reviewing pull requests, files, or diffs containing documentation markdown files.
skill.summary: Review documentation changes for compliance with the Metabase writing style guide. Use when reviewin...

security_audit.summary: No data theft, exfiltration, or malicious execution patterns were found. The skill contains guidance for reviewing documentation and using GitHub review tools only.

content.user_title: Review documentation for Metabase style compliance
content.value_statement: Documentation reviews are slow and inconsistent. This skill checks doc changes against the Metabase style guide and returns clear, numbered issues.
actual_capabilities: Detect tone and voice issues against the Metabase style guide
Check structure, clarity, links, and formatting in markdown docs
Flag code example problems and command ordering issues
Produce sequentially numbered issues for local reviews
Use the GitHub pending review workflow when PR tools are available
limitations: Does not edit files or apply fixes
Focuses on documentation content, not product behavior
Requires access to diffs or files to review
Style guidance is specific to Metabase

use_cases.title: Pre-merge doc QA
use_cases.description: Review a documentation PR for tone, structure, and clarity before merging.

use_cases.title: Consistent doc standards
use_cases.description: Apply the Metabase style guide across team documentation changes.

use_cases.title: Improve help articles
use_cases.description: Check help center updates for readability and link quality.

prompt_templates.title: Review a markdown file
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this markdown file for Metabase style issues and list numbered issues.

prompt_templates.title: Review a docs diff
prompt_templates.prompt: Check this documentation diff for tone, clarity, and formatting issues. Return numbered issues with suggested fixes.

prompt_templates.title: PR documentation review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review the documentation changes in this PR and post numbered issues using the pending review workflow.

prompt_templates.title: Focused link audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Scan the doc changes for weak link text and headings with links. Report numbered issues only.

output_examples.input: Review this doc update for Metabase style compliance.
output: Issue 1: Formal tone in opening paragraph; suggest a more conversational phrasing.
Issue 2: Link text uses "here"; replace with descriptive link text.

best_practices: Provide the exact files or diffs you want reviewed
Ask for a focused pass when you only want a subset of checks
Apply suggested fixes and rerun for a clean review
anti_patterns: Requesting a review without any document content
Using it to review non-documentation code changes

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill is prompt based and works across Claude, Codex, and Claude Code.

faq.question: What are the review limits?
faq.answer: It reviews only the content you provide and does not scan external repositories.

faq.question: Can it integrate with GitHub PRs?
faq.answer: Yes, when GitHub review tools are available it uses a pending review workflow.

faq.question: Does it access my secrets or files?
faq.answer: No. It only reads the content you provide for review.

faq.question: What if it misses an issue?
faq.answer: Provide the specific section and request a focused pass on that area.

faq.question: How is this different from a general editor?
faq.answer: It follows the Metabase style guide and outputs structured, numbered issues.
